name: Heatwave Froggy
description:
Creators:

Program and Game Design: Gerardo Tioseco 
2D and Concept Artist: Zane Baldwin-Small

Save Cappy the frog in this infinite climbing escape from the blue glitchy fire!

Controls:

Mobile/Touchscreen:
Grapple/swing: Touch screen+hold 
Fling Frog: Release Touch

Computers:

Grapple/swing: Mouse click screen + hold
Fling Frog: Release mouse 

Hints:

To fling higher, release swinging frog when tongue is solid white!
50 KMs to sky Level
100KMs to Space Level 

Good Luck and have fun

Extra Credit:
Awesome Royalty free music 
ANGELUX波 Ocean Wind [Synthwave]
Aries Beats - Infinity (80s Retro Saxophone New Wave)
